subject: PING ME! 2023 Recap - Clickatell’s Super Bowl Year 🏈🔥
preview: Looking Back on a Year of Innovation 🚀  2023 was a year of innovation for Clickatell, as we bolstered our Interact and Transact packages with new digital commerce features, and launched Clickatell

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Looking Back on a Year of Innovation 🚀

2023 was a year of innovation for Clickatell, as we bolstered our Interact and Transact packages with new digital commerce features, and launched Clickatell AI! Our product is more robust, more powerful and more secure than ever before, and we are kicking off 2024 with a mix of optimism, creativity and determination to deliver innovative Chat Commerce solutions to businesses like yours, to keep you ahead in an ever-evolving digital world.

Keep reading 👀 We have some 🕶 cool new things to share!

WhatsApp Chatbot Demo

Check out our retail chatbot that demonstrates the benefits of integrating WhatsApp messaging into a customer engagement strategy. We have included a number of the latest interactive features, including buttons and menus, commerce messages, and a secure checkout, that showcase the rich experiences that can be delivered.

🔥 Try it out! 🔥

Scan the QR code in the image above, or use the links below to start the conversation in WhatsApp. Remember to click "Send" to get going! Browse the catalogue, add a product to your cart and even make a purchase! It's just a demo... you won't be charged anything.

Use these 💳 card details to process the transaction:

• First name: anything will work
• Last name: anything will work
• Email: anything will work

• Card no.: 2222 4200 0000 1113
• Expiry: 05/25
• CVV: anything will work (3 digits)

Click HERE or send "Hi" to +27219107857 to launch the Fashion Zone demo.

2024 is the year for WhatsApp! Contact us today to discuss using the world's most popular messaging platform to deliver meaningful customer engagement, innovative customer service, and helpful customer support.

Amanda Cromhout

Founder & CEO
Truth

Werner Lindemann

SVP Global Sales
Clickatell

Brett White

VP Product Payments
Clickatell

Jennifer Shambroom

CSMO

Clickatell

Join us for on-demand webinar, "Accelerate Your Loyalty Program: Harnessing the Power of Mobile Messaging", where industry experts share real-life success stories on how to unlock the true potential of loyalty through mobile messaging channels like WhatsApp, Apple Messages for Business, and SMS. Learn how WhatsApp in particular can transform customer interactions, optimize engagement, and drive retention of your loyalty program.

Watch Now

INTERACT

Easily Initiate Conversations ➡️


Sending WhatsApp messages triggered by your business logic has become easier than ever, with our new Dynamic API workflow. Send pre-approved template messages such as system alerts, promotions, notifications, and welcome messages in a snap, without heavy lifting!


Location Sharing on WhatsApp 🗺️


Send your customers a pin, or let them send you theirs. This feature enables the sharing of location details through WhatsApp, aligning customer service and convenience like never before.


Quality Ratings Visible in Portal 📊


Businesses can now check their WhatsApp number quality ratings directly in the Clickatell portal. This rating is determined by feedback from your customers, and knowing this helps drive better customer interactions.

TRANSACT

Transactions Are More Efficient 💳

For customers making payment in messaging, we took convenience up a notch by merging the Authorization and Capture steps in the process-resulting in more streamlined, secure, and customer-friendly experiences.

January Kickoff 🏈 the NFL Playoffs

The start of Playoffs is SWIFTly approaching, and players will need to SHAKE IT OFF after the holiday season if they are going to be in the END GAME. We're looking at you Travis! Don't miss the Super Bowl LVIII to be played in Las Vegas, on Sunday, February 11. 🏆

The Vikings are Coming!

Scotland's Up Helly Aa is a fire festival held annually through March in various communities in Shetland, Scotland, to mark the end of the Yule season. Participants don Viking attire, wield torches, and burn a replica Viking galley, setting Shetland's night skies ablaze with fiery splendor. 🔥🔥🔥

Here's to a great start to the new year! To learn more about the power of Chat Commerce that delivers superior customer experiences for forward-thinking brands, contact us today! Let us partner with you to create the future of customer engagement.


Chat soon,
Team Clickatell
